title: Did not receive a pentakill?
body:
Played a ranked game as Irelia (ended 25-7-9 if it matters). Got a quadra before chasing their Rengar down for (what should have been) a penta. I killed him about 5-10s before the first person from the other team respawned, yet I did not get a penta for it? Whats happening here, did the ruling for a pentakill change or was this a problem in game?

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/112412015/200595032?tab=overview

"Penta" is right at the end
Match is here if needed
Not sure how to put video on

replies.body:
Hey JAKO6400,

While we do appreciate you taking your time to report a bug, because this is the Help and Support boards, we try to limit posts to technical issues and general questions. As such, I'd like to direct you to the [**Report A Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) sub-boards for posting your bug reports. The Riot staff looking for bug reports frequent those sub-boards more than they frequent the Help & Support sub-boards, so you'll have a higher chance of having the issue addressed if you post there. 

Cheers!
